Text.Page:
Bring me Die 3 and I’ll give you various items in return.

[Source]
Combine 5x Hollow Die and 5x Pioneer’s Luck to receive a Die 1-6.

Hollow Dice can be obtained as login rewards or with a certain probability in dungeons.
Pioneer’s Luck can be obtained in dungeons or as a reward for completing Vanguard Requests.

The easiest method, however, is to purchase Hollow Dice and Pioneer’s Luck from Dicey.
